item.text: Date form received at national leve
The date that the form was received by program at the national level
The name of the health facility
The patients first, middle and last names
What is the sex of the patient
Date of birth of the patient (DD/MM/YYYY)
What is the age of the patient in years?
What is the age of the patient in months?
What is the age of the patient in days?
Name of the parent or guardian for minors or dependents.
Contact information for the affected individual's parent or guardian.
The specific household number or village where the patient resides.
A well-known nearby location that helps identify the residence.
The specific town, city, or geographical location of residence.
The ward  in which the case is located or reported from.
The administrative sub-county in which the case is located or reported from.
The county  in which the case is located or reported from.
The date when the affected individual first sought medical care.
The date when the health facility reported the case to the sub-county and national health authorities.
Health worker/focal person in reporting site
Alternative Health care provider (traditionalhealer, herbalist etc )
The date when the patient was admitted to a healthcare facility.
Inpatient (IP) or Outpatient (OP) number assigned by the health facility.
Was the progression of paralysis less than 3 days?
Was there any injection just before onset of paralysis?
Site of injection in the table below
The medical diagnosis of the condition or disease affecting the patient.
AFTER INVESTIGATION, WAS THIS A TRUE AFP?
Vaccination History for disease under investigation
Was the patient vaccinated against illness (including campaign)?
Was the patient vaccinated against illness (including campaign)?
Number of doses administered(Excluding birth OPV Dose)
The total number of polio vaccines administered (excluding birth OPV)
Date of OPV dose at birth
If more than 4 doses, date of last dose
If more than 4 doses, date of last dose
Were there any vaccines given in the last 30 days?
Date of last OPV dose received through SIA
Date of last OPV dose administered during Supplementary Immunization Activity (SIA) e.g. vaccination campaigns
Total OPV (bOPV/mOPV2) doses received through SIA
Total number of OPV doses administered during Supplementary Immunization Activity (SIA) e.g. vaccination campaigns
Total OPV (bOPV/mOPV2/) doses received through RI
Total number of OPV doses administered during Routine Immunization (RI)
Total IPV doses received through SIA
Total number of IPV doses administered during Supplementary Immunization Activity (SIA) e.g. vaccination campaigns
Total IPV doses received through RI
Total number of IPV doses administered during Routine Immunization (RI)
Date of last IPV dose received through RI or SIA
Date of last IPV dose administered during Routine Immunization (RI) OR Supplementary Immunization Activity (SIA) e.g. vaccination campaigns
What is the source of Routine Vaccination Information
